title: Archon Beta Launch Livestream - What You Missed!
description:
Be a part of the launch of the next big tool for AI coding assistants! In this condensed version of the Archon Beta launch livestream (3 hours condensed to ~1.25), I showcase the power of Archon and how you can use it with existing context engineering strategies with the BMAD Method as our core example.

NOTE: The logo has changed for Archon to keep our branding unique! The logo was too similar to some other things before, and it's nice to bring the shield back from the previous Archon.

As powerful as AI coding assistants are, they almost completely lack two of the most important parts of context engineering - RAG and project management. I built Archon to solve this and completely revolutionize the way we code with AI today. I’m bringing it to you as a beta open source tool that I’m determined to build into the best possible tool for all AI coding. It’s a massive overhaul of my original Archon.

Archon is essentially an entire operating system for AI coding. For you, it's a sleek interface to manage knowledge, context, and tasks for your projects. For the AI coding assistant(s), it's an MCP server to collaborate on and leverage the same knowledge, context, and tasks.
